item.description:
Check out the premier from ESPN Films, Four Days in October... about the greatest baseball story ever told!

Enjoy Complimentary Appetizers

Win Red Sox Monster Tickets!



From ESPN: "after a walk and a hard-fought stolen base, the cold October winds of change began to blow. Over four consecutive days and nights, this unlikely group of Red Sox miraculously won four straight games to overcome the inevitability of their destiny. Using extensive archive coverage from that week, Major League Baseball Productions will produce a film in "real-time" that takes an in-depth look at the 96 hours that brought salvation to Red Sox Nation and made baseball history in the process."
item.name: Four Days in October Viewing Party
